Text: Control Panel - Backup And Restore - Create A System Repair Disc (On The Upper-Left Corner Of The Screen)
Does this work with any version of windows 7 that's 64-bit?

WOW.. this worked a treat. I received an error code 0xc00000e9 on windows 7 startup! was completely fucked b4 i downloaded this. I hadnt created a recovery disc but this little beauty worked a treat!! Lesson learnt... recovery discs now being made as i type!!! THANKYOU VERY MUCH!!!!!!!!

@rogamosh omg i was so lost, but have a working computer and a broken computer. tried doing a system restore because it was slow and then it wouldn't open and kept getting the BSOD. i found this but it wasn't owkring, not that it doesn't work, just that i didn't know how to use it. so i followed your link and used my good computer to make a recovery disk and now everything is great :D
